item.description:
Hi All,

I only have time to play 9 holes this Saturday so I made a tee time (12:00pm) at Hillview Country Club in North Reading in case anyone else wants to join. It's pretty easy to get to from either Rte 93 or 128 and a fun, casual, local course for all levels of golfers.

I'm just going to walk 9 holes ($24), but you can choose to play all 18 if you'd like and also choose to walk or ride. Here is a link to options/rates, and also a link for directions.

http://www.hillviewgc.com/timesrates/

http://www.hillviewgc.com/directions/

When you RSVP, post whether you think you'd like to play 9 or all 18/walk or ride and we can try to group accordingly when we get there.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Hillview CC - Play 9 or 18
